data.text: @CurtisSliwa Burn those shitty unlicensed and unaudited test sites down. Enough is enough.
@CurtisSliwa Curtis… you need more air time on WABC.  Weekends are not enough! Let your many fans know how to advocate on your behalf.

@CurtisSliwa Curtis it’s going to be a point where eventually at Ozanam Hall nursing home we may not even need testing this week we didn’t have to what if it’s a continuing cycle going into the spring as you just said taxpayer dollars it’s finest 🤦🏻‍♂️
@CurtisSliwa @on1vasa Then we have another surge, there are no tents, and people will say that the govt is incompetent for getting rid of them.
@CurtisSliwa because we are not given a choice on how our money is spent.... only choice is pay taxes or go to jail.. welcome to democracy..
@CurtisSliwa The only candidate that could have saved the city-SLIWA!
@CurtisSliwa Bc Hocul is getting juiced....She k own she is out in Nov and just wants to cash grab b4 she goes
@CurtisSliwa They may need to scare us into mail in votes in the future.
